title: Eternal League
description: In Eternal League, you'll embark on an epic journey through a fast-paced roguelike RPG that combines customization, strategic combat, and a unique session-based progression system that rewards your skill and creativity.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# ABOUT THIS GAME
<!--text-->
Welcome to Eternal League – A Sci-Fi Roguelike Action RPG!

Step into a futuristic battleground where every decision shapes your destiny. In Eternal League, you'll embark on an epic journey through a fast-paced action RPG that combines customization, strategic combat, and a unique session-based progression system that rewards your skill and creativity.

<!--image-->
![Eternal League-1obc3](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/612e4d8c10014d40bd5f869d0d4c17cf/eternal-league-1obc3.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Forge Your Ultimate Hero
<!--text-->
At the heart of Eternal League is a robust hero customization system. Tailor your character’s appearance, abilities, and equipment to fit your playstyle. As you progress, upgrade your hero with a diverse array of enhancements—from powerful new skills to cutting-edge gear that gives you an edge in battle. Every upgrade and customization option empowers you to craft a hero that is as unique as your own personal vision of greatness.

<!--image-->
![Eternal League-123i1](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/612e4d8c10014d40bd5f869d0d4c17cf/eternal-league-123i1.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Assemble a Team of Legendary Companions
<!--text-->
You don’t have to fight alone. Recruit a roster of extraordinary companions, each with their own abilities and personalities. These loyal allies are fully upgradeable and can be strategically combined to create devastating synergies. Experiment with different team compositions to find the perfect blend that will help you overcome the relentless challenges of the Eternal League.

<!--image-->
![Eternal League-whkh2](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/612e4d8c10014d40bd5f869d0d4c17cf/eternal-league-whkh2.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Unleash the Power of Glyphs
<!--text-->
Enhance your hero’s potential with an innovative glyph system. These mystical runes offer the ability to randomize and augment your hero’s skills, ensuring that no two battles are ever the same. Embrace the unpredictable nature of glyphs to discover powerful new abilities and devastating combos that can turn the tide of combat in your favor.

Dynamic In-Game Session Progression:
Every play session in Eternal League is a journey of growth and discovery. As you navigate through intricate levels and face increasingly formidable foes, your hero evolves in real time. The session-based progression system keeps the adrenaline high, providing continuous upgrades and challenges that adapt to your performance. The more you play, the more your hero transforms into a force to be reckoned with.

<!--image-->
![Eternal League-1yos1](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/612e4d8c10014d40bd5f869d0d4c17cf/eternal-league-1yos1.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# An Immersive Sci-Fi Universe
<!--text-->
Dive into a visually stunning, futuristic world where technology and mysticism collide. The top-down perspective allows you to fully appreciate the intricate details of the sci-fi landscapes, from neon-lit cities to desolate, post-apocalyptic battlefields. Each environment is teeming with hidden secrets, enemy ambushes, and the promise of untold power.

<!--image-->
![Eternal League-1uk2g](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/612e4d8c10014d40bd5f869d0d4c17cf/eternal-league-1uk2g.png)
